page.title: 13O.S.Area 4344-3839
page.content: This area contains some farmland, together with the Northern tip of the village of Aberford. The A1 trunk road runs due South to North through the middle of the area. The farmland, which lies to the West and the East of the A1, is largely crops (sugar beet, wheat, barley) with some cattle. In the North East of the section is Black Horse Farm which employs 7 people. It also contains a small caravan park. To he West of the A1 there is a small wood, mainly oak, beech and willow. In the South to the West of the A1 is the Northern boundary of the village of Aberford. A minor road links this to the A1 and in this section there are 11 houses, each with a garden, and each containing between 1 and 4 people.
